title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.16 - Maximum allowable working pressure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-1.16 - Maximum allowable working pressure

State Regulations

The maximum allowable working pressure of a power boiler
shall be determined in accordance with the ASME Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-1.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
